subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Irish’s performance in a 68-66 loss to Kentucky might have provided a blueprint for beating the Wildcats. Then again, unbeaten Kentucky might have just had a bad night.
snippet: The Irish’s performance in a 68-66 loss to Kentucky might have provided a blueprint for beating the Wildcats. Then again, unbeaten Kentucky might have just had a bad night.
